name: fishkeeper Aquarium Magnetic Glass Cleaner, Fish Tank Algae Magnet Cleaning Tool with Algae Scraper for Glass Aquariums Tank, Floating Scrubber Brush, 2 Detachable Scrapers, Small
short_description: Strong Magnetic Cleaner Brush: This magnetic aquarium glass cleaner has a strong magnetic suction, designed for cleaning fish tanks, it will not fall off randomly when cleaning, so that you can easily clean the aquarium dirt or algae. Even if you do not use it, magnet cleaning tool can be firmly affixed to the corner of the tank does not take up space, suitable for tanks 0.12 to 0.25 inch thick

Double Sided Cleaning Scrubber: The fish tank magnetic glass cleaner consists of double sided cleaning surface, the inner brush is velcro surface, which can effectively clean the stubborn stains and algae inside the aquarium. And the outer magnet brush is a felt pad, which can wipe the outside of the aquarium dust fingerprints water stains, so your aquarium is pleasing to the eye from the inside to the outside

Two Removable Blades: The aquarium glass cleaner includes two detachable blades: stainless steel scraper and plastic scraper. Stainless steel blades are suitable for glass aquariums and turtle tanks, plastic blades are suitable for acrylic tanks. Note: Use the blades to clean in the same direction towards the blade position, don't change the direction horizontally to avoid scratching the fish tank

Self-Floating Design: The internal brush surface of this aquarium plants cleaner adopts a lightweight magnet floating design, when cleaning the bottom of the aquarium or falling in deep water, it can be automatically suspended in the water, no need to salvage.Using the external magnetic brush to stick it near the aquarium fish tank, aquarium magnet glass cleaner will automatically be attracted and reattached to use

User Friendly Handle Design: The handle of this magnetic fish tank cleaner is ergonomically designed with a comfortable grip, multiple hand holding positions for your choice, you can clean your aquarium algae in the most comfortable way and minimise hand fatigue
